ModMetaData.name: Sons of Sparda - DMC5 Backstories and Traits
ModMetaData.author: YourName
ModMetaData.description:
Adds Dante and Vergil from Devil May Cry 5 as powerful backstories and traits to RimWorld. Includes lore-accurate abilities like Devil Trigger, Son of Sparda heritage, Royal Guard, and Dark Slayer styles. These characters are intentionally overpowered to match their legendary status.
Features: - Dante, Vergil, and Nero backstories with detailed lore-accurate abilities - Son of Sparda trait for Dante with combat prowess and work laziness - Dark Slayer trait for Vergil with power obsession and social isolation - Sparda Bloodline trait for Nero with balanced demonic heritage - Passive regeneration and entity damage bonuses - Complex stat modifications affecting combat, work, social, and survival aspects - Player-only backstories to maintain balance
This mod is designed to be lore-accurate and appropriately powerful for player characters only.
